Html:
Hi.


Is there a reason why the SelectAll and Delete functions of the Grid are not bound to the ApplicationCommands Delete and SelectAll?
This binding is done for the Copy Command but not for these two.

If for example a toolbar button is bound to the ApplicationCommands.SelectAll Command it does not work for the SelectAll functionality of the Grid.

Thanks for the answer.

Hi DDPommes,

The team discussed this and we believe that it was an oversight.  In a future version, we'd like to change it so that the DataGrid's Delete & SelectAll commands forward to ApplicationCommands Delete and SelectAll.  I've filed a bug in our internal database to track this.

Thanks for bringing this to our attention!
Samantha
